name: Stack (itch) (MasterAirscrachDev)
description:
(Download is down temporarily, check back later)

999,999 Randomly generated levels to try and get the highscore on.

Each level has its own leaderboard for you to compete with your friends on

-----Controls-----

Mouse to push and drag objects, scrollwheel while holding an object to rotate it

If you encounter any bugs please post it in the comments or contact me on discord at MasterAirscrach TG_YT#0666
